branchCategory.name: C(D)J2RKA-Z, Air Cylinder, Direct Mount, Non-rotating, Single Acting, Spring Return/Extend
branchCategory.description: <p>Direct Mount CJ2-Z single acting, non-rotating single rod, stainless steel tube, air cylinders are available in 10 and 16mm bore sizes with stroke lengths from 15mm to 150mm. Available in spring extend or spring return. Optional features include port location and magnet for auto-switch capability. Rod end brackets can be ordered with the cylinder under one part number.</p>
